titleStmt.title: Laws and ordinances of warre, established for the better conduct of the army, by His Excellency the Earl of Essex, lord generall of the forces raised by the authority of the Parliament, for the defence of the King and kingdom. Together with a declaration of the Lords and Commons in Parliament, concerning the regulating of great inconveniences in His Excellencies Army.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army.

titleStmt.title: Laws and ordinances of warre, established for the better conduct of the army, by His Excellency the Earl of Essex, lord generall of the forces raised by the authority of the Parliament, for the defence of the King and kingdom. Together with a declaration of the Lords and Commons in Parliament, concerning the regulating of great inconveniences in His Excellencies Army.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army.
Essex, Robert Devereux, Earl of, 1591-1646.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Partridge, and John Rothwell,

notesStmt.note: Signed on C1r: Given under my hand this 8 of September, 1642. Essex.
The first leaf bears the royal arms on verso.
Imperfect: leaf B3 in filmed copy is torn with loss of text.
reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
